attributes.accountability: Responsible for delivering features of small projects
attributes.coding_testing_debugging: Authors new small and/or well-defined programming tasks; debugs own code; designs for testability and documents how to test a feature and/or technology
attributes.data_structures: Uses classical data structures, algorithms, and resource mgmt techniques
attributes.decision_making: Offers constructive opinions, makes decisions within established policies and procedures, seeks guidance from supervisor or more senior peers as needed when determining the appropriate course of action
attributes.direction:
Works under general supervision with manager providing work priorities, timelines, and resources
Recieve instruction on new lines of work or special assignments and progress on work assignments is generally reviewed on a regular basis
attributes.impact:
Work impacts immediate team and may reach across multiple teams

May make recommendations regarding processes in  immediate scope of responsibility
attributes.influence:
Interactions are primarily with peers across the organization, interaction at the Supervisor and Manager levels on matters pertaining to immediate area of work
Productive internal working relationships with have limited external working relationships
attributes.passion_innovation: Supports new ideas and change. Recommends and may implement alternative approaches.
attributes.performance_availability: Can enhance basic telemetry for existing feature
attributes.planning_roi: Provides task breakdown planning, dependencies and time estimates
attributes.requirements_design: Understand requirements and authors technical designs
attributes.results:
Accepts feedback
 Proactive learner, turns mistakes into learning opportunities. Adapts to ambiguity, is open to new ideas, adjusts plans to meet changing needs.

attributes.coding_testing_debugging: Competent in programming and debugging across multiple modules and dealing with related external dependencies; writes high-quality code with domain in mind.
attributes.data_driven_process: Analyzes localized metrics; suggests process improvements and best practices. Identifies new areas to be measured.
attributes.data_structures: Develops according to specific requirements with awareness of scalability, hardware capabilities, and cross-environment and platform implications; implements optimizations with direction.
attributes.decision_making: Justifies decisions and achieves peer consent, makes decisions within established policies and procedures, may propose and/or assist in determining methods and procedures on new assignments
attributes.direction:
Works under only very general supervision and guidance, with more detailed instructions on new assignments
Work is reviewed for soundness of judgment and overall adequacy and accuracy. Works with manager to establish priorities and timelines
attributes.impact:
Work impacts immmediate team and may reach across multiple teams

May make recommendations regarding processes within immediate scope of responsibility
attributes.influence: Typical interactions are internal and have infrequent external interactions on routine matters, may represent engineering on specific projects.   Interactions require tact and effective communication skills as they often involve complex and sensitive information
attributes.passion_innovation: Iterates and improves upon current technology; develops and implements new approaches to very complex issues.
attributes.performance_availability: Can build basic telemetry to show feature is working as expected
attributes.planning_roi: Defines an implementation plan that includes schedule, priorities, dependencies and deliverables.
attributes.requirements_design: Gathers and verifies technical requirements; authors and audits technical designs for features and modules.
attributes.results: Seeks out and accepts feedback, is a proactive learner, takes on tough assignments to improve skills, turns mistakes into learning opportunities. Adapts to ambiguity, is open to new ideas, handles pressure.
attributes.risks_dependencies: Identifies feature and module dependencies and critical path; proposes mitigation plans for identified risks and problems
attributes.team_building: Mentors co-workers within expertise; improves others' productivity; participates in staff recruiting.

attributes.accountability: Responsible for a minor technology or a shareable feature across several projects
attributes.coding_testing_debugging: Mastery of domain programming language; engineers extensible solutions with the team in mind and can fix complex bugs; owns testing plan for domain
attributes.data_driven_process: Defines useful metrics and targets for domain; measurably improves process and best practices to achieve targets.
attributes.data_structures: Defines and implements optimizations; understands metrics and targets; devises new algorithms and data structures for target environment and platform attributes.
attributes.decision_making:
Achieves team consent and buy-in, drives meetings to conclusive results, particularly cross-functionally, makes decisions based on your experience and standard practice within team,
may determine methods and procedures on new assignments
attributes.direction:
Work is performed under limited direction and guidance, with general instructions on new assignments
 and work results are reviewed upon completion
Makes recommendations to your manager about work priorities, timelines and resources
May provide guidance to other employees
attributes.impact: Participates in developing courses of action that either impact your broader function's goals and objectives OR may impact multiple teams
attributes.influence:
Networks with senior internal employees and external representatives in own area of expertise
Represents the organization on assigned projects  Can explain challenges to and can build concensus within your team
attributes.passion_innovation: Iterates and improves upon current technology; develops and implements new approaches to very complex issues.
attributes.performance_availability: Can design and build telemetry for issue analysis including sufficient use case coverage and P1 failures
attributes.planning_roi: Proposes alternative solutions and provides input on staff competencies; audits plans for domain area.
attributes.requirements_design: Authors, reviews and approves requirements and designs for a domain.
attributes.results: Takes on tough assignments. Adapts to ambiguity, is open to new ideas, takes on new responsibilities, handles pressure, adjusts plans to meet changing needs.
attributes.risks_dependencies: Accountable for domain dependencies and critical paths; anticipates risks and provides contingency solutions and timelines.
attributes.team_building: Assists in career development for engineers; inspires teamwork; creates and sustains a positive work environment

attributes.accountability: Responsible for a major technology or shareable feature across several projects

attributes.data_driven_process: Proposes and implements viable process and measurement solutions within the team.
attributes.data_structures: Finds and implements strategic data structures and algorithms within domain that result in significant performance improvements; recognized and acts within team as an expert.
attributes.decision_making: Influences team to achieve project goals; negotiates process, metrics, and targets with external teams, exercise judgment in deciding which method or technique to use to obtain department results or on new assignments

Work is performed under limited direction, establishing own work priorities and timelines
May provide guidance and coordinate work activities of other employees

 Represents the organization as a prime contact on initiatives and projects
Can explain challenges to, and can build concensus within, your function

attributes.planning_roi: For the team, acts as a planning consultant and makes recommendations with Return on Investment in mind.
attributes.requirements_design: Authors, reviews and approves requirements and designs for domains within multiple projects
attributes.results: Takes on the toughest assignments, keeps knowledge and skills on the leading edge. Deals well with ambiguity, is open to new ideas, handles pressure, adjusts plans to meet changing needs. Able to take on multiple assignments.

attributes.team_building: Builds special-interestcommunities and performs formal mentoring within team

attributes.data_structures: Investigates, proposes and solves complex algorithmic and optimization issues; recognized and acts within the function as an expert.

Influences large or multiple teams to achieve project goals, exercises independent judgment in deciding which method or technique to use to obtain functional results
Ensures solutions and results are consistent with organization objectives, decisions made impact goals and objectives of the organizatoin

Work is performed without appreciable direction Exercises considerable latitude in determining objectives and approaches to assignments
 May provide guidance and manage work activities of other staff members for specific projects or objectives

attributes.influence: Serves as consultant to management and internal/external spokesperson for the function on matters pertaining to its policies, plans, objectives and operations  Educate and influce functional leadership on decisions affecting the function

attributes.planning_roi: For the function, acts as a planning consultant and makes recommendations with Return In Investment in mind.

Seeks out and takes on the toughest assignments
 keeps knowledge and skills on the leading edge.
